document_data.name: Lords' Writ
document_data.author: [[Ahghairon]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lords' Writ''''' was a multi-volumed collection of records penned by the famed [[Open Lord]] [[Ahghairon]] of [[Waterdeep]], published in the early 9{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Contents: {{quote|... and every citizen shall have his say, be it in open Court or in private with the Open Lord.|An excerpt from Volume II of ''Lords' Writ''.}}
document_data.History: The second volume of ''Lords' Writ'' was published in the {{YearlinkName|1039}}.
